text: Meghri Fortress (), is an 11th-century Armenian fortress located in the town of Meghri, located on a hill overlooking the old section of the town from the north. Built in 1083, the fortress was founded during the 11th century and entirely rebuilt during the 18th century.ՄԵՂՐԻԻ ԲԵՐԴ ==References== Category:Archaeological sites in Armenia Category:Castles in Armenia Category:Forts in Armenia Category:Tourist attractions in Syunik Province Category:Buildings and structures in Syunik Province Category:Buildings and structures completed in the 11th century Category:Buildings and structures completed in the 18th century
title: Meghri Fortress
